## ![](img/mofworld.png){width="10%"} Digital reticular chemistry -- ["MOFworld"](mof.world) 

I have been very active in developing tools for "digital reticular chemistry" (see also [this article by Yaghi and collaborators](https://www.cell.com/chem/fulltext/S2451-9294(20)30418-6)), i.e., tools for data-driven science with materials such as metal-organic frameworks (MOFs) and covalent-organic frameworks (COFs).
